mdRecord.dcterms:description: Kris Kristofferson/Janis Joplin song lyric, but attributed to "CBK;" also, lyrics from the Strokes song "I'll Try Anything Once" [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Bodos | meaning of life | yes | "Freedom is just another word for nothing to lose" | everybody was well-dressed and everybody was a mess, oh all the girls played mental games and all the guys were dressed
